spark.utils.urldecoding

Class Utf8StringBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • spark.utils.urldecoding.Utf8Appendable
      • spark.utils.urldecoding.Utf8StringBuilder

  • public class Utf8StringBuilder
extends Utf8Appendable
    UTF-8 StringBuilder.

    This class wraps a standard StringBuilder and provides methods to append UTF-8 encoded bytes, that are converted into characters.

    This class is stateful and up to 4 calls to Utf8Appendable.append(byte) may be needed before state a character is appended to the string buffer.

    The UTF-8 decoding is done by this class and no additional buffers or Readers are used. The UTF-8 code was inspired by http://bjoern.hoehrmann.de/utf-8/decoder/dfa/
